00001 package newtonERP.logging;
00002 
00003 import java.io.BufferedWriter;
00004 import java.io.FileWriter;
00005 import java.io.IOException;
00006 import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
00007 import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
00008 
00026 public class Logger
00027 {
00028 
00029         private static FileWriter fstream = null;
00030         private static BufferedWriter out = null;
00031         private static SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat(
00032                         "HH:mm:ss yyyy.MM.dd");
00033 
00037         public enum State
00038         {
00042                 DEBUG,
00043 
00047                 INFO,
00048 
00052                 WARNING,
00053 
00057                 ERROR;
00058         }
00059 
00063         public static void init()
00064         {
00065                 try
00066                 {
00067                         if (out == null)
00068                         {
00069                                 if (fstream != null)
00070                                 {
00071                                         fstream.close();
00072                                         fstream = null;
00073                                 }
00074                                 fstream = new FileWriter("logs.txt", true);
00075                                 out = new BufferedWriter(fstream);
00076                         }
00077                 } catch (IOException e)
00078                 {
00079                         e.printStackTrace(); // we do not want the logging system to crash
00080                         // the app
00081                 }
00082         }
00083 
00087         public static void close()
00088         {
00089                 try
00090                 {
00091                         out.close();
00092                 } catch (IOException e)
00093                 {
00094                         e.printStackTrace(); // we do not want the logging system to crash
00095                         // the app
00096                 }
00097         }
00098 
00105         public static void log(String message, State state)
00106         {
00107                 String strState;
00108                 init();
00109 
00110                 switch (state)
00111                 {
00112                 case DEBUG:
00113                         strState = "DEBUG";
00114                         break;
00115                 default:
00116                 case INFO:
00117                         strState = "INFO";
00118                         break;
00119                 case WARNING:
00120                         strState = "WARNING";
00121                         break;
00122                 case ERROR:
00123                         strState = "ERROR";
00124                         break;
00125                 }
00126                 message = sdf.format(new GregorianCalendar().getTime()) + " ["
00127                                 + strState + "]  \t" + message;
00128                 try
00129                 {
00130                         out.write('\n' + message);
00131                 } catch (IOException e)
00132                 {
00133                         e.printStackTrace(); // we do not want the logging system to crash
00134                         // the app
00135                 }
00136                 switch (state)
00137                 {
00138                 case DEBUG:
00139                 case INFO:
00140                         System.out.println(message);
00141                         break;
00142                 case WARNING:
00143                 case ERROR:
00144                 default:
00145                         System.err.println(message);
00146                         break;
00147                 }
00148         }
00149 
00154         public static void debug(String message)
00155         {
00156                 log(message, State.DEBUG);
00157         }
00158 
00163         public static void info(String message)
00164         {
00165                 log(message, State.INFO);
00166         }
00167 
00172         public static void warning(String message)
00173         {
00174                 log(message, State.WARNING);
00175         }
00176 
00181         public static void error(String message)
00182         {
00183                 log(message, State.ERROR);
00184         }
00185 }
